1420320.name: Let's Learn Japanese! Kanji Sudoku
1420320.description:
Let's learn Japanese kanji!

Learn and practice Japanese number kanji at your own pace.

With over 50 levels and 4 game modes, you'll learn Japanese number kanji while enjoying a real Sudoku challenge.

Play Sudoku your way: 4x4, 6x6, 9x9 and Samurai Sudoku all await you!

As you play, you'll become adept at reading and differentiating between Japanese kanji. It's a perfect jumping-off point for learning more difficult Japanese kanji.

Are you ready? Let's play Sudoku with kanji!
1420320.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
